response.overview: The Kazakh language is a rich and beautiful language of the Akyns, poets, batyrs, it is the language of the steppe. But there is still some skepticism about the national language among the population itself. The authors of the film conducted a documentary study and tried to reveal such important aspects as the role of the Kazakh language in society, the attitude towards the language among young people and its prospects for development in the future. The heroes of the film were residents of cities and villages, representatives of creative and not only young people, volunteers and migrants.
response.title: Qazaq Tili
